backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing three timelineâ€‘related UX improvements and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend React components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering Hero, Timeline, and Proposal sections plus a footer.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Cele: Generates and animates falling heart and confetti particles using warm colors.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with decorative background blobs and large animated romantic heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/Proposa: Proposal UI with Yes/No buttons, moving No button logic, playful messages, and celebration trigger.
frontend/src/components/sections/Timelin: Horizontally scrollable timeline with animated event cards, scroll hint, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalTimeline: Provides horizontal scroll controls, refs, and state for timeline navigation with interaction tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Uses IntersectionObserver to track when an element enters the viewport, with optional one-time triggering.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, and custom animations and utilities for styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up QueryClient and Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, existing features, and known UI/UX issues for the Proposal Day site.
